                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	dojo.addOnLoad(function() { 
		shoppingActionsJS.setCommonParameters('-5','12761','10001','G','$');
		shoppingActionsServicesDeclarationJS.setCommonParameters('-5','12761','10001');
	});
	//Declare refresh controller which are used in pagination controls of SearchBasedNavigationDisplay -- both products and articles+videos	
	wc.render.declareRefreshController({
		id: "prodRecommendationRefresh_controller_bloque_cyber_weekend_home",
		renderContext: wc.render.getContextById("searchBasedNavigation_context"),
		url: "",
		formId: ""
	
		,renderContextChangedHandler: function(message, widget) {
			var controller = this;
			var renderContext = this.renderContext;
			var resultType = renderContext.properties["resultType"];
			if(resultType == "products" || resultType == "both"){
				widget.refresh(renderContext.properties);
				console.log("espot refreshing");
			}
		}
			
		/**
		 * Clears the progress bar after a successful refresh.
		 *
		 * @param {Object} widget The refresh area widget.
		 */
		,postRefreshHandler: function(widget) {
			var controller = this;
			var renderContext = this.renderContext;
			cursor_clear();
			
			var refreshUrl = controller.url;
			var emsName = "";
			var indexOfEMSName = refreshUrl.indexOf("emsName=", 0);
			if(indexOfEMSName >= 0){
				emsName = refreshUrl.substring(indexOfEMSName+8);
				if (emsName.indexOf("&") >= 0) {
					emsName = emsName.substring(0, emsName.indexOf("&"));
					emsName = "script_" + emsName;
				}
			}
				
			if (emsName != "") {
				if (dojo.byId(emsName) != null) {
					var espot = dojo.query('.genericESpot',dojo.byId(emsName).parentNode)[0];
					if (espot != null) {
						dojo.addClass(espot,'emptyESpot');
					}
				}
			}
			dojo.publish("CMPageRefreshEvent");
		}
	});
</script>

<!-- END CatalogEntryRecommendation.jsp -->
	<span class="nodisplay">Espot</span>

		url: "",
		formId: ""
	
		,renderContextChangedHandler: function(message, widget) {
			var controller = this;
			var renderContext = this.renderContext;
			var resultType = renderContext.properties["resultType"];
			if(resultType == "products" || resultType == "both"){
				widget.refresh(renderContext.properties);
				console.log("espot refreshing");
			}
		}
			
		/**
		 * Clears the progress bar after a successful refresh.
		 *
		 * @param {Object} widget The refresh area widget.
		 */
		,postRefreshHandler: function(widget) {
			var controller = this;
			var renderContext = this.renderContext;
			cursor_clear();
			
			var refreshUrl = controller.url;
			var emsName = "";
			var indexOfEMSName = refreshUrl.indexOf("emsName=", 0);
			if(indexOfEMSName >= 0){
				emsName = refreshUrl.substring(indexOfEMSName+8);
				if (emsName.indexOf("&") >= 0) {
					emsName = emsName.substring(0, emsName.indexOf("&"));
					emsName = "script_" + emsName;
				}
			}
				
			if (emsName != "") {
				if (dojo.byId(emsName) != null) {
					var espot = dojo.query('.genericESpot',dojo.byId(emsName).parentNode)[0];
					if (espot != null) {
						dojo.addClass(espot,'emptyESpot');
					}
				}
			}
			dojo.publish("CMPageRefreshEvent");
		}
	});
</script>

<!-- END CatalogEntryDisplay.jsp --><!-- START AnalyticsProducts.jspf 11-->


<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>                
                
<!-- END AnalyticsProducts.jspf --><!-- END RecommendedCatalogEntryDisplay.jspf -->

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');

  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');

  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>                
                
<!-- END AnalyticsProducts.jspf --><!-- END RecommendedCatalogEntryDisplay.jspf -->
					</div></div><div class="owl-item" style="width: 180px; margin-right: 10px;"><div>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');

  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

                });

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');

  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');

<script type="text/javascript">
	dojo.addOnLoad(function() { 
		shoppingActionsJS.setCommonParameters('-5','12761','10001','G','$');
		shoppingActionsServicesDeclarationJS.setCommonParameters('-5','12761','10001');
	});
	//Declare refresh controller which are used in pagination controls of SearchBasedNavigationDisplay -- both products and articles+videos	
	wc.render.declareRefreshController({
		id: "prodRecommendationRefresh_controller_Carrousel_PuedeInteresar",
		renderContext: wc.render.getContextById("searchBasedNavigation_context"),
		url: "",
		formId: ""
	
		,renderContextChangedHandler: function(message, widget) {
			var controller = this;
			var renderContext = this.renderContext;
			var resultType = renderContext.properties["resultType"];
			if(resultType == "products" || resultType == "both"){
				widget.refresh(renderContext.properties);
				console.log("espot refreshing");
			}
		}
			
		/**
		 * Clears the progress bar after a successful refresh.
		 *
		 * @param {Object} widget The refresh area widget.
		 */
		,postRefreshHandler: function(widget) {
			var controller = this;
			var renderContext = this.renderContext;
			cursor_clear();
			
			var refreshUrl = controller.url;
			var emsName = "";
			var indexOfEMSName = refreshUrl.indexOf("emsName=", 0);
			if(indexOfEMSName >= 0){
				emsName = refreshUrl.substring(indexOfEMSName+8);
				if (emsName.indexOf("&") >= 0) {
					emsName = emsName.substring(0, emsName.indexOf("&"));
					emsName = "script_" + emsName;
				}
			}
				
			if (emsName != "") {
				if (dojo.byId(emsName) != null) {
					var espot = dojo.query('.genericESpot',dojo.byId(emsName).parentNode)[0];
					if (espot != null) {
						dojo.addClass(espot,'emptyESpot');
					}
				}
			}
			dojo.publish("CMPageRefreshEvent");
		}
	});
</script>

<!-- BEGIN CatalogEntryRecommendation_Horizontal_UI.jspf -->
		<div class="titulo-owl">
			
		</div>

		<div id="owl-catalogEntryRecommendationWidget_4_-1012_3074457345618316506" class="owl-management-center owl-carousel owl-theme owl-loaded owl-drag">
				
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
					
		<div class="owl-stage-outer"><div class="owl-stage" style="transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: all 0s ease 0s; width: 3420px;"><div class="owl-item active" style="width: 180px; margin-right: 10px;"><div>
						<!-- BEGIN RecommendedCatalogEntryDisplay.jspf --><!-- BEGIN CatalogEntryDisplay.jsp -->

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

                    <a id="add2CartBtn_834109" onclick="javascript:setCurrentId('add2CartBtn_834109'); QuickInfoJS.showDetails('834109', undefined, undefined, undefined, false, 130, 834610);" class="btn btn-primary btn-block btn_agp" wairole="button" role="button" title="Agregar al carrito">
                        Comprar
                        <i class="fa fa-chevron-right pull-right"></i>

        if(dojo.byId("comparebox_834109").checked){

                dojo.byId("comparebox_834109").checked = '';

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>                
                
<!-- END AnalyticsProducts.jspf --><!-- END RecommendedCatalogEntryDisplay.jspf -->

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

                        <i class="fa fa-chevron-right pull-right"></i>
                    </a>
 
                
        </div>
    </div>
</div>


</div>

<!-- END CatalogEntryDisplay.jsp --><!-- START AnalyticsProducts.jspf 11-->


<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>                
                
<!-- END AnalyticsProducts.jspf --><!-- END RecommendedCatalogEntryDisplay.jspf -->

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//Tie the following function via a Javascript event handler onClick to the links of all the products listed on a page:
// Called when a link to a product is clicked.
function onProductClick(id, name, category, url, widgetSuffix) {
		ga('ec:addProduct',{
		// productFieldObject stores product click and other details
		'id': id, // Product ID/SKU - Type: string
		'name': name, // Product name - Type: string
		'category': category, // category Product category - Type: string
	});

	var title = getMenuTitles();
	if(widgetSuffix == "_2_-1002_3303"){
	        title = "Nuevos artículos";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_1307"){ //CAMBIO
	        title = "Recomendaciones";
	}else if(widgetSuffix == "_6_-1002_25601"){ //CAMBIA
	        title = "Lo más vendido";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_20301"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Otras personas también compraron";
	}else if (widgetSuffix == "_8_-1012_17807"){ //CAMBIA
			title = "Productos similares"
	}
	ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {list: title});
	ga('send', 'event', 'Category Page', 'Product Clicked', id);
	//document.location.href = url;
}

function addToShopCartPLP(id,name,category,qty,catEntryIdentifier) {
  var priceObj = document.querySelector('[id^="offerPrice_'+catEntryIdentifier+'"]');
  
  if (priceObj!=null && priceObj!='undefined'){
  var priceId = priceObj.id; 
  var price = document.getElementById(priceId).innerHTML;
  price = price.replace('$','');
  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  
  ga('ec:setAction', 'click', {'list': getMenuTitles()});
  ga('send', 'event', 'automatic', 'click', 'add to cart',{'nonInteraction': 1});     // Send data using an event.

  ga('ec:addProduct', {
    'id': id,
    'name': name,
    'category': category,
    'price': price.trim(),
    'quantity': qty    
  });
  ga('ec:setAction', 'add');
  ga('send', 'event', 'UX', 'click', 'add to cart');     // Send data using an event.
}
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

					dojo.query('#searchInStoreBtn').onclick( function(event) {
                		ga('send', 'event', 'Buscar en Tienda', 'click', '');
                });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	dojo.addOnLoad(function() { 
		shoppingActionsJS.setCommonParameters('-5','12761','10001','G','$');
		shoppingActionsServicesDeclarationJS.setCommonParameters('-5','12761','10001');
	});
	//Declare refresh controller which are used in pagination controls of SearchBasedNavigationDisplay -- both products and articles+videos	
	wc.render.declareRefreshController({
		id: "prodRecommendationRefresh_controller_NuevosBloquesComercial_1",
		renderContext: wc.render.getContextById("searchBasedNavigation_context"),
		url: "",
		formId: ""
	
		,renderContextChangedHandler: function(message, widget) {
			var controller = this;
			var renderContext = this.renderContext;
			var resultType = renderContext.properties["resultType"];
			if(resultType == "products" || resultType == "both"){
				widget.refresh(renderContext.properties);
				console.log("espot refreshing");
			}
		}
			
		/**
		 * Clears the progress bar after a successful refresh.
		 *
		 * @param {Object} widget The refresh area widget.
		 */
		,postRefreshHandler: function(widget) {
			var controller = this;
			var renderContext = this.renderContext;
			cursor_clear();
			
			var refreshUrl = controller.url;
			var emsName = "";
			var indexOfEMSName = refreshUrl.indexOf("emsName=", 0);
			if(indexOfEMSName >= 0){
				emsName = refreshUrl.substring(indexOfEMSName+8);
				if (emsName.indexOf("&") >= 0) {
					emsName = emsName.substring(0, emsName.indexOf("&"));
					emsName = "script_" + emsName;
				}
			}
				
			if (emsName != "") {
				if (dojo.byId(emsName) != null) {
					var espot = dojo.query('.genericESpot',dojo.byId(emsName).parentNode)[0];
					if (espot != null) {
						dojo.addClass(espot,'emptyESpot');
					}
				}
			}
			dojo.publish("CMPageRefreshEvent");
		}
	});
</script>

<!-- END CatalogEntryRecommendation.jsp --><!-- BEGIN ContentRecommendation.jsp --><!-- BEGIN ContentRecommendation_UI.jspf -->

			<!-- BEGIN Content_UI.jspf -->

<script type="text/javascript">
	dojo.addOnLoad(function() { 
		shoppingActionsJS.setCommonParameters('-5','12761','10001','G','$');
		shoppingActionsServicesDeclarationJS.setCommonParameters('-5','12761','10001');
	});
	//Declare refresh controller which are used in pagination controls of SearchBasedNavigationDisplay -- both products and articles+videos	
	wc.render.declareRefreshController({
		id: "prodRecommendationRefresh_controller_coppelpay-viajes-sorteos-periodico",
		renderContext: wc.render.getContextById("searchBasedNavigation_context"),
		url: "",
		formId: ""
	
		,renderContextChangedHandler: function(message, widget) {
			var controller = this;
			var renderContext = this.renderContext;
			var resultType = renderContext.properties["resultType"];
			if(resultType == "products" || resultType == "both"){
				widget.refresh(renderContext.properties);
				console.log("espot refreshing");
			}
		}
			
		/**
		 * Clears the progress bar after a successful refresh.
		 *
		 * @param {Object} widget The refresh area widget.
		 */
		,postRefreshHandler: function(widget) {
			var controller = this;
			var renderContext = this.renderContext;
			cursor_clear();
			
			var refreshUrl = controller.url;
			var emsName = "";
			var indexOfEMSName = refreshUrl.indexOf("emsName=", 0);
			if(indexOfEMSName >= 0){
				emsName = refreshUrl.substring(indexOfEMSName+8);
				if (emsName.indexOf("&") >= 0) {
					emsName = emsName.substring(0, emsName.indexOf("&"));
					emsName = "script_" + emsName;
				}
			}
				
			if (emsName != "") {
				if (dojo.byId(emsName) != null) {
					var espot = dojo.query('.genericESpot',dojo.byId(emsName).parentNode)[0];
					if (espot != null) {
						dojo.addClass(espot,'emptyESpot');
					}
				}
			}
			dojo.publish("CMPageRefreshEvent");
		}
	});
</script>

<!-- END CatalogEntryRecommendation.jsp -->
	<span class="nodisplay">Espot</span>

			if(resultType == "products" || resultType == "both"){
				widget.refresh(renderContext.properties);

		 *
		 * @param {Object} widget The refresh area widget.

		,postRefreshHandler: function(widget) {
			var controller = this;

			cursor_clear();

<script>
	require(['dojo/dom-geometry'], function(domGeom) {
	    var recommendationsDivNode = dojo.query('.custom-recommendations > div > div:last-of-type')[0];
	    var recommendationsDivNodeTitle = dojo.query('..custom-recommendations-heading .left_espot h2')[0];
	    //var contentBox = domGeom.getContentBox(recommendationsDivNode);
	    //domGeom.setContentSize(recommendationsDivNode, {w:contentBox.w});
	    if(typeof recommendationsDivNode != 'undefined'){
	    	 domGeom.setContentSize(recommendationsDivNode, {w:window.innerWidth});
	    }
	    if(typeof recommendationsDivNodeTitle != 'undefined'){
	   		 domGeom.setContentSize(recommendationsDivNodeTitle, {w:window.innerWidth});
	    }
	    //alert(contentBox.w);
	});
			
	function readDeviceOrientation() {
	    if(window.innerHeight < window.innerWidth){
	        //alert("Landscape")
			require(['dojo/dom-geometry'], function(domGeom) {
			    var recommendationsDivNode = dojo.query('.custom-recommendations > div > div:last-of-type')[0];
			    var recommendationsDivNodeTitle = dojo.query('..custom-recommendations-heading .left_espot h2')[0];
			    domGeom.setContentSize(recommendationsDivNode, {w:window.innerWidth});
			    domGeom.setContentSize(recommendationsDivNodeTitle, {w:window.innerWidth});
			});
	    } else {
	    	//alert("Portrait")
			require(['dojo/dom-geometry'], function(domGeom) {
			    var recommendationsDivNode = dojo.query('.custom-recommendations > div > div:last-of-type')[0];
			    var recommendationsDivNodeTitle = dojo.query('..custom-recommendations-heading .left_espot h2')[0];
			    domGeom.setContentSize(recommendationsDivNode, {w:window.innerWidth});
			    domGeom.setContentSize(recommendationsDivNodeTitle, {w:window.innerWidth});
			});
	    }
	}
	//window.onresize = readDeviceOrientation;
</script>
				</div>
			</div>

		<script>
			function pulsar(e) {
				tecla = (document.all) ? e.keyCode : e.which;
				return (tecla != 13);
			}
			
			
		</script>

									function getLinkPeriodicoMotos(){
										var isCatalogo = document.getElementById("catalogoCoppel").value;

											window.open(getlinkmotos[0].href,'_blank');
										 }
											  	
									}
