							      	function PopupCenter(url, title, w, h) {
							      		var obj1 = document.getElementById("btnocultoRevista");
							      		document.getElementById('revistas').src = url;
							      		obj1.click();
									}

									/**		
									*Funcion para obtener los parametros de la URL		
									*		
									*/		
								   function getParameterByName(name, url) {				
									    if (!url) url = window.location.href;		
									    name = name.replace(/[\[\]]/g, '\$&');		
									    var regex = new RegExp('[?&]' + name + '(=([^&#]*)|&|#|$)'),		
									        results = regex.exec(url);		
									    if (!results) return null;		
									    if (!results[2]) return '';		
									    return decodeURIComponent(results[2].replace(/\+/g, ' '));		
									}		
									/*		
									*Funcion para setear el localstorage con los perfiles		
									*/		
									function setearLocalStoregePerfiles(){		
										var canal = getParameterByName('canal');		
										if ( canal != null && canal !='null' ) {		
										  	localStorage.setItem('canalVenta', canal);		
										}		
									}		
									setearLocalStoregePerfiles();

		var link = document.getElementById("link_proveedor");
		link.style = document.getElementById("isLinks").value;

		link = document.getElementById("link_gris");
		link.style = document.getElementById("isLinks").value;

		link = document.getElementById("link_bancoppel");
		link.style = document.getElementById("isLinks").value;

		link = document.getElementById("link_afore");
		link.style = document.getElementById("isLinks").value;

		link = document.getElementById("link_afore2");
		link.style = document.getElementById("isLinks").value;

		link = document.getElementById("link_trabaja");
		link.style = document.getElementById("isLinks").value;
		
		var isCatalogo = document.getElementById("catalogoCoppel").value;
		if (isCatalogo == "true"){
			link = document.getElementById("link_RegistroClienteHuella");
			link.style = "display: block;";
		}

	    .on('focus', function(){ $(this).removeAttr('placeholder') })

<script type="text/javascript">
	dojo.addOnLoad(function() { 
		//Make sure page is loaded at this point
		//Set requestedSubmitted to false
		requestSubmitted = false;

		// All div's whose id attribute contains dojoWidget subString -- dojo.query('div[id*="dojoWidget"]')
		// All div's which contains dojoType attribute -- dojo.query(div[dojoType])
		dojo.query('div[dojoType]').forEach(function(node, index, arr){
			addToWidgetsList(node.id);
		});
		parseAllWidgets();
	}); 	
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

if(document.getElementById('contentRecommendationWidget_3_-1000_1301')) {
	var contentRecommendationUI = document.getElementById('contentRecommendationWidget_3_-1000_1301');
	//var contentRecommendationUIImageArray = contentRecommendationUI.getElementsByTagName('img');
	var contentRecommendationUITitle = document.getElementById('title_3_-1000_1301').textContent.trim();
	var contentRecommendationUIh3Array = contentRecommendationUI.getElementsByTagName('h3');

	var contentRecommendationUItotallength = "";

	if(contentRecommendationUIh3Array.length > 6){
		contentRecommendationUItotallength = (contentRecommendationUIh3Array.length / 6);
	}else{
		contentRecommendationUItotallength = 1;
	}
	var contentRecommendationUIlengthOfRecommendations = new Array();
	var contentRecommendationUIimagesUserHasSeen = new Array();

	for(var i = 0; i < Math.round(contentRecommendationUItotallength); i++) {
		if(contentRecommendationUItotallength > 6){
			contentRecommendationUIlengthOfRecommendations[i] = 6;
		}else{
			contentRecommendationUIlengthOfRecommendations[i] = contentRecommendationUIh3Array.length;
		}
	}

	for(var a = 0; a < contentRecommendationUIlengthOfRecommendations[0]; a++)
	{
		//var contentRecommendationUIimgageAlt = contentRecommendationUIImageArray[a].getAttribute('alt');
		var contentRecommendationUIh3 = contentRecommendationUIh3Array[a].textContent.trim();
		contentRecommendationUIimagesUserHasSeen[a] = contentRecommendationUIh3;
	}
}
if(document.getElementById('catalogEntryRecommendationWidget_2_-1002_3303')) {
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsImages = document.getElementById('catalogEntryRecommendationWidget_2_-1002_3303');
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArray = catalogEntryRecommendationsImages.getElementsByTagName('img');
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsTitle =  document.getElementById('title_2_-1002_3303').textContent.trim();

	var catalogEntryRecommendationsLength = "";

	if(catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArray.length > 4){
		catalogEntryRecommendationsLength = (catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArray.length / 4);
	}else{
		catalogEntryRecommendationsLength = catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArray.length;
	}

	var catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRec = new Array();
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesUserHasSeen = new Array();

	for(var i = 0; i < Math.round(catalogEntryRecommendationsLength); i++) {
		if(catalogEntryRecommendationsLength > 4){
			catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRec[i] = 4;
		}else{
			catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRec[i] = catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArray.length;
		}
	}

	for(var position = 0; position < catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRec[0]; position++)
	{
		var catalogEntryRecommendationsImgageAlt = catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArray[position].getAttribute('alt');
		catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesUserHasSeen[position] = catalogEntryRecommendationsImgageAlt;


	}
}

if(document.getElementById('catalogEntryRecommendationWidget_3_-1002_1304')) {
	
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesSlider = document.getElementById('catalogEntryRecommendationWidget_3_-1002_1304');
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArraySlider = catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesSlider.getElementsByTagName('img');
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsTitleSlider =  getTitle('title_3_-1002_1304');
	
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthSlider = "";

	if(catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArraySlider.length > 6){
		catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthSlider = (catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArraySlider.length / 6);
	}else{
		catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthSlider = catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArraySlider.length;
	}

	var catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRecSlider = new Array();
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesUserHasSeenSlider = new Array();

	for(var i = 0; i < Math.round(catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthSlider); i++) {
		if(catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthSlider > 6){
			catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRecSlider[i] = 6;
		}else{
			catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRecSlider[i] = catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArraySlider.length;
		}
	}
	
	for(var position = 0; position < catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRecSlider[0]; position++)
	{
		var catalogEntryRecommendationsImgageAltSlider = catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArraySlider[position].getAttribute('alt');
		catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesUserHasSeenSlider[position] = catalogEntryRecommendationsImgageAltSlider;


	}
}

if(document.getElementById('categoryRecommendationWidget_7_-1012_3305')) {
	var slide = document.getElementById('categoryRecommendationWidget_7_-1012_3305');
	var slideArray = slide.getElementsByTagName('img');
	var slideTitle =  'Conoce más de ' + getMenuTitles();

	var slideLength = "";

	if(slideArray.length > 4){
		slideLength = (slideArray.length / 4);
	}else{
		slideLength = slideArray.length;
	}

	var slideLengthSlider = new Array();
	var slideMap = new Array();

	for(var i = 0; i < Math.round(slideLength); i++) {
		if(slideLength > 4){
			slideLengthSlider[i] = 4;
		}else{
			slideLengthSlider[i] = slideArray.length;
		}
	}

	for(var position = 0; position < slideLengthSlider[0]; position++)
	{
		var slideAlt = slideArray[position].getAttribute('alt');
		slideMap[position] = slideAlt;


	}
}

			catalogEntryItemsOfIterestImgesLengthRec[i] = 6;
		}else{
			catalogEntryItemsOfIterestImgesLengthRec[i] = catalogEntryItemsOfIterestImgesArray.length;
		}

	{

	<script type="text/javascript">	
	
		var catalogo = document.getElementById('catalogoCoppel').value;
		
		if (catalogo != "true") {
			dojo.ready( // Migrating to dojo
				function () {
					window.setTimeout(function(){
						if  (!$zopim.livechat.isChatting()) { $zopim.livechat.button.show();};
					}, 10000); // Minimize after 10 seconds
				}
			);
			dojo.ready( // Migrating to dojo
				function () {
					window.setTimeout(function(){
						if  (!$zopim.livechat.isChatting()) { 
							if(showZopimlivechat()){
								$zopim.livechat.button.show();
							} else {
								$zopim.livechat.hideAll();
							}
						};
					}, 5000); // Minimize after 5 seconds
					function showZopimlivechat(){
						try{
							var url = window.location.search;
							var urlsplit = url.split("&");
							for(var x=0; x < urlsplit.length; x++ ){
								if(urlsplit[x] == 'origen=MDR'){
									return false;
								}
							}
							return true;
						}catch(ex){
							return true;
						}
					}
					
					try {
				window.$zopim||(function(d,s){var z=$zopim=function(c){z._.push(c)},$=z.s=
				d.createElement(s),e=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];z.set=function(o){z.set.
				_.push(o)};z._=[];z.set._=[];$.async=!0;$.setAttribute('charset','utf-8');
				$.src='//v2.zopim.com/?2aZLpjIIH5eTnNi9aV9ps3C0isLEDiy5';z.t=+new Date;$.
				type='text/javascript';e.parentNode.insertBefore($,e)})(document,'script');
				
				
				} catch(e) {
					console.log("Ocurrio un error en chat Zopim");
					console.log(e);
				}
				
				$zopim(function() {
	    			$zopim.livechat.departments.setVisitorDepartment('Coppel.com');
	  			});
	  			
				}
				
				
				
			);
			
			
			
			
		}
		
	</script>

<script>
	function suscripcionesHome() {
		if(!$("input[name=footer_subscribe_tipo_home]:checked").val()) {
			alert('Elige tu sexo para enviarte información de tu interés.');
		}else{
			var elem1 = document.getElementById('suscripcionForm_home');
			var elem2 = $('input:radio[name=footer_subscribe_tipo_home]:checked').val();
			Suscripciones(elem1, elem2);
		}
	}
	
	$(document).ready(function() {
		$('#suscripcionForm').formValidation({
	        framework: 'bootstrap',
		    
		    icon: {
	            valid: 'fa fa-check',
	            invalid: 'fa fa-times',
	            validating: 'fa fa-spinner'
	        },
	
	        fields: {
	            
	            email1: {
	                validators: {
	                    notEmpty: {message: 'Campo requerido'},
						emailAddress: {
	                        message: 'Ingresa un correo válido'
	                    }
	                }
	            },
	            
	            email2: {
	                validators: {
	                    notEmpty: {message: 'Campo requerido'},
						emailAddress: {
	                        message: 'Ingresa un correo válido'
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    });
	    
	    $('#suscripcionForm_home').formValidation({
	        framework: 'bootstrap',
		    
		    icon: {
	            valid: 'fa fa-check',
	            invalid: 'fa fa-times',
	            validating: 'fa fa-spinner'
	        },
	
	        fields: {
	            
	            email1: {
	                validators: {
	                    notEmpty: {message: 'Campo requerido'},
						emailAddress: {
	                        message: 'Ingresa un correo válido'
	                    }
	                }
	            },
	            
	            email2: {
	                validators: {
	                    notEmpty: {message: 'Campo requerido'},
						emailAddress: {
	                        message: 'Ingresa un correo válido'
	                    }
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    });
	});
</script>


<script type="text/javascript">
	dojo.addOnLoad(function() { 
		//Make sure page is loaded at this point
		//Set requestedSubmitted to false
		requestSubmitted = false;

		// All div's whose id attribute contains dojoWidget subString -- dojo.query('div[id*="dojoWidget"]')
		// All div's which contains dojoType attribute -- dojo.query(div[dojoType])
		dojo.query('div[dojoType]').forEach(function(node, index, arr){
			addToWidgetsList(node.id);
		});
		parseAllWidgets();
	}); 	
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

if(document.getElementById('contentRecommendationWidget_3_-1000_1301')) {
	var contentRecommendationUI = document.getElementById('contentRecommendationWidget_3_-1000_1301');
	//var contentRecommendationUIImageArray = contentRecommendationUI.getElementsByTagName('img');
	var contentRecommendationUITitle = document.getElementById('title_3_-1000_1301').textContent.trim();
	var contentRecommendationUIh3Array = contentRecommendationUI.getElementsByTagName('h3');

	var contentRecommendationUItotallength = "";

	if(contentRecommendationUIh3Array.length > 6){
		contentRecommendationUItotallength = (contentRecommendationUIh3Array.length / 6);
	}else{
		contentRecommendationUItotallength = 1;
	}
	var contentRecommendationUIlengthOfRecommendations = new Array();
	var contentRecommendationUIimagesUserHasSeen = new Array();

	for(var i = 0; i < Math.round(contentRecommendationUItotallength); i++) {
		if(contentRecommendationUItotallength > 6){
			contentRecommendationUIlengthOfRecommendations[i] = 6;
		}else{
			contentRecommendationUIlengthOfRecommendations[i] = contentRecommendationUIh3Array.length;
		}
	}

	for(var a = 0; a < contentRecommendationUIlengthOfRecommendations[0]; a++)
	{
		//var contentRecommendationUIimgageAlt = contentRecommendationUIImageArray[a].getAttribute('alt');
		var contentRecommendationUIh3 = contentRecommendationUIh3Array[a].textContent.trim();
		
		contentRecommendationUIimagesUserHasSeen[a] = contentRecommendationUIh3;

}
if(document.getElementById('catalogEntryRecommendationWidget_2_-1002_3303')) {
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsImages = document.getElementById('catalogEntryRecommendationWidget_2_-1002_3303');
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArray = catalogEntryRecommendationsImages.getElementsByTagName('img');
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsTitle =  document.getElementById('title_2_-1002_3303').textContent.trim();

	var catalogEntryRecommendationsLength = "";

	if(catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArray.length > 4){
		catalogEntryRecommendationsLength = (catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArray.length / 4);
	}else{
		catalogEntryRecommendationsLength = catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArray.length;
	}

	var catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRec = new Array();
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesUserHasSeen = new Array();

	for(var i = 0; i < Math.round(catalogEntryRecommendationsLength); i++) {
		if(catalogEntryRecommendationsLength > 4){
			catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRec[i] = 4;
		}else{
			catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRec[i] = catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArray.length;
		}
	}

	for(var position = 0; position < catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRec[0]; position++)
	{
		var catalogEntryRecommendationsImgageAlt = catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArray[position].getAttribute('alt');
		ga('ec:addPromo',{
		  'id': 'image_'+position,
		  'name': 'Nuevos artículos',
		  'creative': catalogEntryRecommendationsImgageAlt,
		  'position': position
		});
		catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesUserHasSeen[position] = catalogEntryRecommendationsImgageAlt;


	}
}

if(document.getElementById('catalogEntryRecommendationWidget_3_-1002_1304')) {
	
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesSlider = document.getElementById('catalogEntryRecommendationWidget_3_-1002_1304');
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArraySlider = catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesSlider.getElementsByTagName('img');
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsTitleSlider =  getTitle('title_3_-1002_1304');
	
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthSlider = "";

	if(catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArraySlider.length > 6){
		catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthSlider = (catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArraySlider.length / 6);
	}else{
		catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthSlider = catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArraySlider.length;
	}

	var catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRecSlider = new Array();
	var catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesUserHasSeenSlider = new Array();

	for(var i = 0; i < Math.round(catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthSlider); i++) {
		if(catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthSlider > 6){
			catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRecSlider[i] = 6;
		}else{
			catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRecSlider[i] = catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArraySlider.length;
		}
	}
	
	for(var position = 0; position < catalogEntryRecommendationsLengthOfRecSlider[0]; position++)
	{
		var catalogEntryRecommendationsImgageAltSlider = catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesArraySlider[position].getAttribute('alt');
		ga('ec:addPromo',{
		  'id': 'image_'+position,
		  'name': 'Recomendaciones',
		  'creative': catalogEntryRecommendationsImgageAltSlider,
		  'position': position
		});
		catalogEntryRecommendationsImagesUserHasSeenSlider[position] = catalogEntryRecommendationsImgageAltSlider;


	}
}

if(document.getElementById('categoryRecommendationWidget_7_-1012_3305')) {
	var slide = document.getElementById('categoryRecommendationWidget_7_-1012_3305');
	var slideArray = slide.getElementsByTagName('img');
	var slideTitle =  'Conoce más de ' + getMenuTitles();

	var slideLength = "";

	if(slideArray.length > 4){
		slideLength = (slideArray.length / 4);
	}else{
		slideLength = slideArray.length;
	}

	var slideLengthSlider = new Array();
	var slideMap = new Array();

	for(var i = 0; i < Math.round(slideLength); i++) {
		if(slideLength > 4){
			slideLengthSlider[i] = 4;
		}else{
			slideLengthSlider[i] = slideArray.length;
		}
	}

	for(var position = 0; position < slideLengthSlider[0]; position++)
	{
		var slideAlt = slideArray[position].getAttribute('alt');
		ga('ec:addPromo',{
		  'id': 'image_'+position,
		  'name': slideTitle,
		  'creative': slideAlt,
		  'position': position
		});
		slideMap[position] = slideAlt;


	}
}

			var expires; //expire date of the cookie
			var value; //cookie's value
			date.setTime(date.getTime()+(30*24*60*60*1000));
			expires = date.toUTCString();

			value = url.search(/[?|&]utm_source=([^&;]+?)?cpc(&|#|;|$)/i)!=-1?"criteo":"other";

					var products = [];
					for(var j = 0; j < listaProductos.length; j++)
					{	
						var producto = {};		
						var arrPartNumber = listaProductos[j].partNumber.split('-');
						var item = '';
						if(arrPartNumber[0] == 'IR')
						{
							item += 'PR-';
						}
						else 
						{
							item += 'PM-'; 
						}
						 item += arrPartNumber[1];
								
						producto.item = item;						
						var precio = 0;
						if(listaProductos[j].price.length > 1)
						{
							for(k = 0; k < listaProductos[j].price.length; k++)
							{
								if(listaProductos[j].price[k].usage == "Offer")
								{
									precio = listaProductos[j].price[k].value;
								}
							}
						}
						else
						{
							precio = listaProductos[j].price[0].value;
						}
						
						producto.price = parseFloat(precio);
						producto.quantity = parseInt(listaProductos[j].cantidad);
						products.push(producto);
					}
